title: Any recommendation from testing laboratory for any form of corrective measures that are needed to be adopted shall be compiled
clause_text: Any recommendation from testing laboratory for any form of corrective measures that are needed to be adopted shall be compiled. Copy of any such recommendation and necessary action taken shall also be sent by the testing laboratories to the Competent Authority / EHO of respective Wards. Maintenance of Recycling Plant should be done by the Developer or Housing Society or Owner.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
